text: Someone who is right-handed will use their right-hand for everyday activities, such as writing, keeping personal hygiene, cooking and more. According to a studies, anywhere from 70% to 90%Psychology for A-level second edition, page 309 of the world population is right-handed, while most of the remaining are left-handed. A small percentage of the population can use both hands equally well; a person with this ability is called a ambidextrous. ==Related pages== *Handedness == References == Category:Motor skills
title: Right-handedness
